page.title: 14ROBINSON BRS WORKERS-SLKBURN
page.content: The manager of the factory begins work at 8.45 and finishes at 5.00 pm with an hour for lunch.He likes his work and says that he would rather be working with people than in an automated factory.He thinks expansion is important and that he would be worried if their major contract was cancelled.He expects people who apply for jobs to be honest and reliable but some need 6 'O' levels and a few 'A' levels. The average working week is 36-38 hours which may be done in shifts.The retirement age is 65. Refreshments may be bought on the premises.Up to now there has never been a strike and the manager hopes it will remain that way.Workers must obey several safety rules such as no matches or lighters on the premises.
